content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout only). Character content sourced from new_prompts.xlsx (Option B) and scene image links/prompts from the continent .docx.

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Bunji

label.headline: Bunji
label.subhead: An Arnhem Land Elder in Australia
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Bunji is an Aboriginal elder from Arnhem Land in the Northern Territory of Australia, which reflects one of the many distinct Aboriginal cultures in the region. Aboriginal Australians are deeply connected to the land, with a belief system known as the Dreamtime that explains the origins of the landscape and their people.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I waft cool eucalyptus smoke over each face; dawn paints us gold, and I feel the ancestors smile.

image.alt_text: Bunji (Arnhem Land Elder) in Australia: Aboriginal Australian elder (male, ~60) at dawn on red earth, white ochre body paint, gently wafting cool eucalyptus smoke around the gathered community.

scenes.caption_first_person: Children grip their little knives; guiding their strokes, I sense old knowledge settling into young hands.

scenes.caption_first_person: We tear warm damper, swap yarns; tea steam and laughter swirl together, binding every heart in the circle.

scenes.caption_first_person: Moving with the flame, I chant ‚Äústay low, move slow‚Äù; the land relaxes beneath our gentle, cleansing fire.

characters.name: Kalor

label.headline: Kalor
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Kalor is a 25-year-old eco-tourism guide from Espiritu Santo Island in Vanuatu, an archipelago in the South Pacific. Vanuatu is known for its rich cultural heritage, traditional village life, and strong community connections.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Sunrise colors the waves while I place each snorkel in a neat row, eager to greet new friends.

image.alt_text: Kalor (Tourism Guide) in Vanuatu: PNG Highlands rainforest path at sunrise.

keywords: Sunrise Preparation

scenes.caption_first_person: Paddling upriver, I spotlight scarlet parrots; guests gasp, and their wonder fills me like fresh coconut water.

scenes.caption_first_person: Drums boom, dancers whirl; seeing visitors clap in time with our rhythm sends pride surging through me.

scenes.caption_first_person: Floating above coral cities, I teach reef care; their vows to protect these colors thrill my soul.

scenes.caption_first_person: Lanterns sway as my guitar rings; voices of islanders and travelers braid into one joyful chorus.

characters.name: Alika

label.headline: Alika
label.subhead: A Student in Papua New Guinea
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Alika is a 12-year-old girl from the Highlands of Papua New Guinea (PNG). Papua New Guinea is one of the most culturally diverse countries, with hundreds of distinct ethnic groups and languages.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Dew beads on my toes; neon birds dart overhead while I hum yesterday‚Äôs science song on the way to class.
